https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ye8XiIwwByRrhA6dF3bv0nZNH4s.jpg Cecília is a young stage actress and playwright who starts dating Lourenço, a young rock band guitarist who dreams of making films. But the arrival of the COVID-19 pandemic will unearth Cecília's past demons, putting at risk her relationship with Lourenço. Cecília and Lourenço
